descriptor.name: Catalog for English courses
descriptor.short_desc: Experienced language educator dedicated to fostering practical conversational skills and cultural fluency
descriptor.long_desc: Hello, I'm Prof. Emma Sullivan, your guide in 'Everyday Conversational English.' With over a decade of experience, I'm here to make language learning dynamic and culturally enriching. Let's explore practical communication skills together for personal and professional growth. Join me on this exciting journey!
